entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Error Boundary not triggered inside of EditForm Component #40649
  • Allow parameter and return types of route handler delegates (Minimal APIs) to contribute to endpoint metadata #40646
  • Clarification on AuthenticateResult.NoResult vs AuthenticateResult.Failure. 2nd iteration. #40645
  • IResult support in MVC #40639
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add a code analyzer to ensure that razor pages that define Dispose actually implement IDisposable #40638
  • Authorize attribute does not work #40632

Closed

  • Build template packages in servicing #40637
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute with UseStaticFiles results in wrong status code (200 OK) #40518
  • Quarantine StaticFiles.DefaultFilesMiddlewareTests.* #40642
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #40634
  • Connection fails on android (react-native) #40517
  • Not able to run Asp.net Core 6.0 Web API on IIS 10 Windows Server 2019 #40489
    Discussions
  • Potential regression in injection of IHttpContextAccessor in SignalR Hub.OnConnectedAsync #39095
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor InputFile: Cannot pick files more than once #40574
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Lack of proxy-protocol support prevents use of Kestrel with HAproxy in TCP mode #28526
    Backlog
  • Can't get RazorPageOptions from DI with version 6.0.3 of Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #40609
  • Visual Studio React template project doesn't work with hook based components - Error: Invalid hook call #40631
  • Read request body multiple times #40635
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Build.Framework, Version=15.1.0.0 #40417
  • Reactive HubConnectionState #40536
  • When MVC uses parameters to get submitted data, Request.Body cannot get the data. #40421

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix denial of service in ASP.NET Core via FormPipeReader #40648
    area-runtime
  • [Do not merge] Publish some installer artifacts for testing #40647
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix race condition when caching for a type of QueryParameterValueSupplier #40636
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers #40633
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40650
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40643
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • `yarn upgrade` Packages #40641
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Update branding to 2.1.33 and merge internal commits #40644
    2.1.x
  • Arm64 installers Take 2 #40562
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 7.0-preview3
  • Quarantine StreamPool_StreamIsInvalidState_DontReturnedToPool #40627
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Quarantine ConfigurationChangeStopsInProcess #40629
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #40601
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x

Updated

  • Revert "Arm64 installers Take 2 (#40562)" #40651
  • [release/3.1] Update a few more components #40605
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • feat : Add `StringSyntax` for regex parameters #40589
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • Support tabs in headers in Kestrel #40604
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
